articles.title: Stock limits imposed on edible oils, oil seeds to cool prices - Mint
articles.description: High prices of edible oil in international market has a substantial impact on the domestic edible oil prices
articles.content:
NEW DELHI :
The government on Sunday said it has imposed stock limits on edible oils and oil seeds till end of March 2022 in order to soften prices and give relief to consumers.

articles.description: The event that could eventually send prices to $100 per barrel is that some industries have begun switching fuel from high priced gas to oil.
